GapFillInput.Title: The Title
GapFillInput.Instruction: Complete the gaps with one of the phrases for comparing (e.g. the same as) from Module 3.

Content.Question:
Receptionist: Good afternoon. Metroplus Computing. Can I help you?
Steve: Oh hello. I'd like to speak to Alex Howell please.
Receptionist: Alex Howell. Okay it's ringing for you.
Pippa: Hello Customer Service, how can I help?
Steve: Oh hello, can I speak to Alex Howell, please?
Pippa: Who’s calling?
Steve: It’s Steve Morris.
Pippa: One moment. Steve Morris … Hello? I’m afraid Mr Howell’s out of the office at the moment. Can I take a message?
Steve: Do you know when he'll be back?
Pippa: Er … not until … tomorrow. Shall I ask him to call you back?
Steve: Well, he promised to contact me this morning but I haven’t heard anything.
Pippa: Okay. I’ll ask him to call you back as soon as he gets back.
Steve: No, I’ll try again tomorrow morning. What time does he start?
Pippa: Tomorrow. Let me see. He won't be back in the office until ten.
Steve: Okay, I’ll phone then. Can you tell him I phoned?
Pippa: Certainly, Mr Morris.
Steve: Thanks. Goodbye.
Pippa: Goodbye.
Alex: Thank you, Pippa. Thank you so much.
